options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking (Cooldown: 4 sec. Inflicts 500% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)

options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage.
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec.
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion (Inflicts 180% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road (Inflicts 230% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor (Inflicts 370% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain: Attack Speed +1% and Casting Speed +1.5% for every 5 Fire Resistance

options.explain:

options.explain:
Attacking enemies in Abnormal statuses casts Nature's Fury, randomly casting one of the following effects on all enemies in 450 px: Fire Flare, Ice Pick, Lightning Strike, or Dark Bomb.
Attacking enemies in Abnormal statuses increases all Elemental Damage +10 for 10 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)
options.explainDetail:
Attacking enemies in Abnormal statuses casts Nature's Fury, randomly casting one of the following effects on all enemies in 450 px: Fire Flare, Ice Pick, Lightning Strike, or Dark Bomb. (Cooldown: 0.5 sec. Inflicts 75% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
Attacking enemies in Abnormal statuses increases all Elemental Damage +10 for 10 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain:
Creates a Soul Sword upon entering dungeons, applying the following effects.
- Skills add 5 Soul stacks to this Soul Sword.
- Normal/Jump/Dash attacks consume 1 Soul stack and inflict additional damage.
- At the max Soul stacks, Normal/Jump/Dash attacks consume all the stacks and inflict additional damage.
options.explainDetail:
Creates a Soul Sword upon entering dungeons, applying the following effects.
- Skills add 5 Soul stacks to this Soul Sword. (Max Stacks: 50)
- Normal/Jump/Dash attacks consume 1 Soul stack and apply damage. (Inflicts 15% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- At the max Soul stacks, Normal/Jump/Dash attacks consume all the stacks and apply damage. (Inflicts 600% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
